name: CATARACT_PLANNING_LENSES
description: This table contains information about the lens selected to have ready for cataract surgery.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type of lens planned for use in cataract surgery

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_MODEL
columns.description: Stores the selected model of intraocular lens.

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_POWER
columns.description: Stores the selected lens power for the intraocular lens

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_AXIS
columns.description: Stores the axis for a intraocular lens

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_SUP_ID
columns.description: Stores the selected supply record for the intraocular lens

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_CMTS
columns.description: Stores comments related to the intraocular lens selection

columns.name: OPH_CAT_SPECORD_YN
columns.description: Note on whether the lens is a special order lens

columns.name: OPH_LENSSEL_TARGET
columns.description: Target refraction number for the selected lens
